Module DynamicMaterialEditor
Header /Engine/Plugins/Experimental/DynamicMaterial/Source/DynamicMaterialEditor/Public/Components/DMMaterialStage.h
Include #include "Components/DMMaterialStage.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (MinimalAPI, BlueprintType, ClassGroup="Material Designer",  
       Meta=(DisplayName="Material Designer Stage"))  
class UDMMaterialStage : public UDMMaterialComponent

Remarks

A component which wraps a source and its inputs.
